CustomField.description: Visual tool created in Salesforce to identify if the due date is close
CustomField.formula: IF( DueDate__c - TODAY() > 2 ,IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+'resource/GREEN', 'GREEN' ,20, 20), IF((DueDate__c - TODAY() > 0 && TODAY() - DueDate__c <= 2), IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) + 'resource/YELLOW', 'YELLOW' ,20, 20) , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services',$Api.Partner_Server_URL_260)) + 'resource/RED', 'RED' , 20, 20)) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Green: Invoice not due Yellow: Invoice shortly before due date Red: Overdue invoice
CustomField.label: Due Date Indicator
